description: External alterations to include, at ground floor level with new shop front including double glazed timber doors and fascias to match existing details, and rear to include new door to existing opening. At first floor level to include, at front elevations, new double glazed timber windows and new rear window and door opening with glazed balustrade, new window at existing opening. At second floor level to include, new double glazed timber windows to front elevation. At roof level, replace roof, insertion of steel balustrade, privacy screen, render of wall, removal of existing chimney. Internal alterations to ground floor/shop to include, new walls to facilitate kitchen, W.C and creation new stairs to upper floor levels. Creation of 3no. self contained flats above existing shop, including, associated amenity space, refuse and recycle store, cycle store, and creation of new front and rear entrance and stairs to upper flats
